definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.note.bass</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle"><field name="particle">CLOUD</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="xs"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="ys"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value><value name="zs"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
